The Georgian ambassador to the United Kingdom (known formally as the '''Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Georgia to the Court of St James's''') is the official representative of the president of Georgia and the Georgian Government to the monarch and government of the United Kingdom. The position is vacant. As of 15 October 2024, it is being covered by Mr George Saganelidze, Charge d'Affaires ad interim.
